rows.label: qst104226_msg0001
rows.name:
Right, I think that wraps it up for
everyone's questions. I guess I'll give
you a salvaging demonstration now!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0002
rows.name: Hey Rex-sensei! I got another question!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0003
rows.name: Which girl are you sweet on?

rows.label: qst104226_msg0005
rows.name:
Ooh, I wanna know too!
Are you going out with someone?

rows.label: qst104226_msg0006
rows.name:
Me too, me too! I heard Correl
worrying about whether you'd
get married!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0007
rows.name:
Ooh, are you getting married,
Rex-sensei?! When? When?

rows.label: qst104226_msg0010
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]H-hold on, all of you!
You're getting way ahead of yourselves!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0011
rows.name:
A-anyway, we're going to do
a salvaging demonstration!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0012
rows.name:
Everyone come with me
to Messet Point!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0013
rows.name: Ahaha! Rex-sensei's face is bright red!

rows.label: qst104226_msg0017
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]They'll have to respect me when
they see my salvaging skills in action!
